item.title: OpenAI Is Poised To Become The Most Valuable Startup Ever. Should It Be?
item.description: The AI startup is chasing a $500 billion valuation, with backers betting it can become the next Apple or Google. There are reasons for skepticism.

item.description: The AI startup is chasing a $500 billion valuation, with backers betting it can become the next Apple or Google. There are reasons for skepticism.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Panicking About Zohran Mamdani. NYC’s Tech Scene Is Not
item.description: New York City tech leaders aren’t rattled by the prospect of a Mayor Mamdani. In fact, many of them welcome it.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Panicking About Zohran Mamdani. NYC’s Tech Scene Is Not

item.title: How Microschools Became the Latest Tech Mogul Obsession
item.description: Between homeschool provisions in the One Big Beautiful Bill and Trump’s attempts to gut the Department of Education, teaching kids looks different now. Silicon Valley’s answer? Microschools.

item.title: How Microschools Became the Latest Tech Mogul Obsession
item.description: Between homeschool provisions in the One Big Beautiful Bill and Trump’s attempts to gut the Department of Education, teaching kids looks different now. Silicon Valley’s answer? Microschools.

item.title: xAI Was About to Land a Major Government Contract. Then Grok Praised Hitler
item.description: Internal emails obtained by WIRED show a hasty process to onboard OpenAI, Anthropic, and other AI providers to the federal government. xAI was on the list—until MechaHilter happened.

item.title: xAI Was About to Land a Major Government Contract. Then Grok Praised Hitler
item.description: Internal emails obtained by WIRED show a hasty process to onboard OpenAI, Anthropic, and other AI providers to the federal government. xAI was on the list—until MechaHilter happened.

item.title: Inside Dylan Field’s Big IPO—and His Even Bigger Plans for Figma
item.description: Dylan Field took Figma public in one of the wildest IPOs in recent memory. He insists the real story is the rise of design itself.

item.title: Inside the Biden Administration’s Unpublished Report on AI Safety
item.description: The US government conducted a groundbreaking study on frontier models—and never published the results.

item.title: Inside the US Government's Unpublished Report on AI Safety
item.description: The National Institute of Standards and Technology conducted a groundbreaking study on frontier models just before Donald Trump’s second term as president—and never published the results.

item.title: At $250 million, top AI salaries dwarf those of the Manhattan Project and the Space Race
item.description: A 24 year-old AI researcher will earn 327x what Oppenheimer made while developing the atomic bomb.

item.title: Is Silicon Valley Losing Its Influence on DC?
item.description: This episode of Uncanny Valley covers black holes, woke AI, and the relationship between Silicon Valley billionaires and the Trump Administration.

item.title: The GOP's Message for Tech Billionaires: Be Like Peter Thiel
item.description: One lesson Republican insiders took away from Elon Musk’s spectacular flameout? Be wary of billionaires who love the spotlight.

item.title: Silicon Valley AI Startups Are Embracing China’s Controversial ‘996’ Work Schedule
item.description: In an industry once known for cushy perks, some founders are now asking staff to commit to a 72-hour weekly schedule. You’re either in or you’re out.
